column1: MRI size (256, 256, 1) in weighting T2, showing the head of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section n°118 initiated from the back of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 416.6016 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 657.8613 mm³.

The following elements are present in the image: the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 416.6016 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 657.8613 mm³.
